title: 1985년 Lindewall 사건
summary: 미국 New York, NY 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Lindewall. 판결일: 1985-11-04. 법원: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: The People of the State of New York v. Leonard Lindewall
**판결일**: 1985-11-04
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

## 인용

- 114 A.D.2d 860

## 판결문 요약


—Appeal bydefendant from a judgment of the County Court, Westchester County (Marasco, J.), rendered January 26, 1983, convicting him of burglary in the third degree, upon his plea of guilty, and imposing sentence.
Judgment affirmed.
We have reviewed the record and agree with defendant’s assigned counsel that there are no meritorious issues which could be raised on appeal. Counsel’s application for leave to *861withdraw as counsel is granted (see, Anders v California, 386 US 738; People v Paige, 54 AD2d 631; cf. People v Gonzalez, 47 NY2d 606). Bracken, J. P., Weinstein, Kunzeman and Kooper, JJ., concur.
...
